org.jamsim.ascape.stats

Class CollectorFunctionPerIteration<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • StatCollectorCondCSA
      • org.jamsim.ascape.stats.CollectorFunction<T>
        • org.jamsim.ascape.stats.CollectorFunctionPerIteration<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the scape member this collector gets data from.

    public class CollectorFunctionPerIteration<T>
extends CollectorFunction<T>
    Collect data values per iteration. i.e: the value collected is divided by the current number of iterations.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollectorFunctionPerIteration

        public CollectorFunctionPerIteration(java.lang.String name,
                             StatsFunction<T> valueFunction,
                             MutableDouble denominator,
                             Scape iteratingScape)
        Construct a CollectorFunctionPerIteration with no predicate. ie: will collect data for all members.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the value being collected
        valueFunction - value to collect from the scape members
        denominator - value to divide the sum by in CollectorFunction.getRatio().
        iteratingScape - used to determine the current iteration

      • CollectorFunctionPerIteration

        public CollectorFunctionPerIteration(java.lang.String name,
                             StatsFunction<T> valueFunction,
                             StatsPredicate<T> predicate,
                             MutableDouble denominator,
                             Scape iteratingScape)
        Master constructor for a CollectorFunctionPerIteration.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the value being collected
        valueFunction - value to collect from the scape members
        predicate - predicate to determine which scape members to collect data for. If null, collects data for all members.
        denominator - value to divide the sum by in CollectorFunction.getRatio().
        iteratingScape - used to determine the current iteration
